Quickly search smarter with Mega Search ‚Äì Your personalized multi-engine assistant!

Mega Search is a robust Chrome extension that redefines the way you search online. It analyzes your current search query and empowers you to explore results across multiple search engines and platforms‚Äîall with a single click!

With Mega Search, switch seamlessly between AI assistants, image, video, shopping, or news searches. The extension even adapts to your language and country, redirecting you to the most relevant platforms and localized results.
